overview: "How do you start over once you have betrayed a nation's trust?" The news of Hansie Cronj√©'s involvement with Indian bookmakers and his resulting public confession rocked the international sporting community. An unprecedented rise to glory was followed by the most horrific fall. A tarnished hero fueled the nation's fury.
tagline: How do you start over once you have betrayed a nation's trust?
title: Hansie
